column2: "Your name was <%me>, right? How did it go?"
"This small cloth? it was something left by the shadows?"
"I knew it! It wasn't just a dream!"
"That's great. That means there's someone out there that I need to thank."
"I'm going to hurry up and get better so I can go look for them in person."

"<%me>, if it's not too much trouble,
I'd like you to go with me."
